001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSettingsResponse;
010
011/**
012 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSettingsResponse}, opCode -84, size 6
013 *
014 * <br>
015 *
016 * 
017 * <table border='1'>
018 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
019 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-84</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
020 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>6</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSettingsResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * </table>
026 */
027@MessageProps(
028    opCode=-84,
029    size=6,
030    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
031    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
032    signed=true,
033    response=SetIDPSettingsResponse.class
034)
035public class SetIDPSettingsRequest extends Message {
036
037    private int idpId;
038    private int profileInsulinDuration;
039    private int profileCarbEntry;
040    private int changeTypeId;
041    private ChangeType changeType;
042    
043    public SetIDPSettingsRequest() {}
044
045    public SetIDPSettingsRequest(int idpId, int profileInsulinDuration, int profileCarbEntry, ChangeType changeType) {
046        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, profileInsulinDuration, profileCarbEntry, changeType.id);
047        this.idpId = idpId;
048        this.profileInsulinDuration = profileInsulinDuration;
049        this.profileCarbEntry = profileCarbEntry;
050        this.changeTypeId = changeType.id;
051        this.changeType = getChangeType();
052        
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * <table border="1">
057     * <caption>Parsed fields for SetIDPSettingsRequest:</caption>
058     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
059     * <tr><td><code>profileInsulinDuration</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 2)</code></td></tr>
060     * <tr><td><code>profileCarbEntry</code></td><td><code>raw[4]</code></td></tr>
061     * <tr><td><code>changeTypeId</code></td><td><code>raw[5]</code></td></tr>
062     * <tr><td><code>changeType</code></td><td><code>getChangeType()</code></td></tr>
063     * </table>
064     */
065    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
066        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
067        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
068        this.cargo = raw;
069        this.idpId = raw[0];
070        this.profileInsulinDuration = Bytes.readShort(raw, 2);
071        this.profileCarbEntry = raw[4];
072        this.changeTypeId = raw[5];
073        this.changeType = getChangeType();
074        
075    }
076
077    
078    /**
079     * <table border="1">
080     * <caption>Byte layout for SetIDPSettingsRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
081     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
082     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) idpId} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>new byte[]{1} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileInsulinDuration) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileInsulinDuration) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) profileCarbEntry} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) changeTypeId} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
088     * </table>
089     */
090    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, int profileInsulinDuration, int profileCarbEntry, int changeTypeId) {
091        return Bytes.combine(
092            new byte[] {(byte) idpId, 1},
093            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileInsulinDuration),
094            new byte[]{ (byte) profileCarbEntry, (byte) changeTypeId }
095        );
096    }
097
098    public int getChangeTypeId() {
099        return changeTypeId;
100    }
101
102    public int getIdpId() {
103        return idpId;
104    }
105
106
107    public enum ChangeType {
108        CHANGE_INSULIN_DURATION(1),
109        CHANGE_CARB_ENTRY(4),
110
111        ;
112
113        private final int id;
114        ChangeType(int id) {
115            this.id = id;
116        }
117
118        public static ChangeType fromId(int id) {
119            for (ChangeType type : values()) {
120                if (type.id == id) {
121                    return type;
122                }
123            }
124            return null;
125        }
126    }
127
128    public ChangeType getChangeType() {
129        return ChangeType.fromId(changeTypeId);
130    }
131
132    public int getProfileInsulinDuration() {
133        return profileInsulinDuration;
134    }
135    public int getProfileCarbEntry() {
136        return profileCarbEntry;
137    }
138    
139    
140}
